content.question: The short-run Phillips curve shows that

choices.label: there is a trade-off between inflation and unemployment
high rates of unemployment are linked to high rates of interest
high rates of inflation are linked to high rates of interest
high rates of interest are consistent with increases in the money supply
the natural rate of unemployment is unattainable

content.answer: there is a trade-off between inflation and unemployment

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
